posts.title: KidsLIVE! Blogs: An Author Talk with Christian Robinson
posts.text: Robinson reads from "Milo Imagines the World," answers questions from NYPL librarians, and talks about working on an illustration until he's "happy with it."

posts.title: Best Books for Kids 2018 at the Andrew Heiskell Library
posts.text: From picture books to poetry to early chapter books, here is our list of the best kids books of the year.

posts.title: Best Books for Teens 2018 at the Andrew Heiskell Library
posts.text: Presenting our recommendations of the year's best in fiction and nonfiction for YA readers.

posts.title: Best Books for Kids 2017 at the Andrew Heiskell Library
posts.text: Every year, NYPL librarians come together to create the Best Books for Kids list. This post gathers every title available at Heiskell from that list and provides links to the titles in our digital book (DB) collection or on Bookshare.
